# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. This price reflects the investment we've made in its development and the high standards it meets. I trust you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer
